item.title: The One With Better Django Queries
item.author: Author
item.description: Okay, It has to be said first. Django is one of the prettiest framework you could work with. It offeres everthing under the hood, but as Uncle Ben used to say, With great power there must also come great responsibility Not using things properly or the right way could cause lot of issues. So let’s go ahead and see some Django queries and how it performs on different conditions.
